reviewText: A B rated T & A movie.

Not quite a kathy Shower vehicle but a worthy mode of transport none the less for the delectable (was ever a word created that describes Kathy's looks and carrage?) Shower. I spent months if not years looking for this film and when I fianlly saw it I thought not bad. The storyline... Kathy plays bored wife of Movie exec who is having affair with young stud. The main story revolves around the young stud who meets wild girl of his own age and in doing so two times two-timing Shower. Look, I'll be honest. I hunted and watched this film purely and unadulteratedly for Kathy Ann Shower. I was not disappointed as Kathy has two very hot sex scenes. the first in a bathrobe in a convertable - nice, the second while making love on the floor with a very risque 'getting up and leaving scene' - even better. If you are a Kathy shower fan, then get this film now. If you're an 'erotic thriller/drama' fan then you may like this film too.
I gave it 4 stars for Kathy's appearance and because the film had a cool quality to it. Slick...

Actually, about the only thing that makes Hindsight (unrated version) valuable is the delicious Playmate of the Year Kathy Shower.  The fireplace scene where the young Ken Steadman has his way in devouring the  all-to-willing Kathy Shower is a must see for Kathy Shower fans.  The  influences of John T. Bone and Ron Jeremy are evident in Kathy's on the  edge scene that borders  the adult genre.

The best, and perhaps the only, redeeming value of Hindsight is Kathy Shower.  John T. Bone as director and Ron Jeremy's influence from Adult Movies, provide enough steamy, hot and fairly explicit sexual encounters to  keep one's interest. Especially noteworthy is Kathy Shower's sexual  encounter with a very young, eager, and obviously sexually charged Ken  Steadman in front of the fireplace.  If you enjoy Playmate of the Year  Kathy Shower, and want to see her get eaten alive by a hungry young stud  then I would suggest that Hindsight is a must see!

Does anyone know the role Kathy Shower plays in the film, and if so, the quality of the scenes in which she's in. 'Does she get her cloths off', and if so, for how long?
A Kathy Shower fan at oliviatracey@hotmail.com
In this fabulous epic Ron Jeremy aka HedgeHog proves that indeed Hindsight is 20-20.

This movie is one of the best adult movies I have seen in a long time.  Besides for having a great plot, the "romantic scenes" are very hot.  The actors/actresses are extremely attractive, making for a drama  that is a great turn-on!  A must see!
